short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Official extension for Zero To Mastery Academy students.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open Source plugin for the ZTM community built by ZTM students. Allows you to have added features you can turn On/Off inside ZTM Academy such as:
- Side Bar Toggle
- Dark Mode
- Course Length/Section Times/Watch Times
- Hide Lecture Titles
- Favourite Courses
- Daily Motivation
- Course Details Pages

Feel free to contribute to this project and make it better: https://github.com/sithu-khant/ztm-extension

Want to learn more about Zero To Mastery or become a member? Check out: https://zerotomastery.io/
